unnormalised: Arre bhai, tujo PAN card number Aadhaar cardak link kela ki na? Nimnni tarik 31/03/2024 asa, na zalear tujea ITR-ak problem zatle, ani GSTIN cancelui zaunk xakta!
normalised: Arre bhai, tunv tujem P-A-N card number Aadhaar-ak link kela mhunn assa? Nimanni tarik ektees March don hazar chovis, warna tujem I-T-R-ak problem zatle, ani G-S-T-I-N zaiat tor cancel zatlem!
text: Arre bhai, tujo PAN card number Aadhaar cardak link kela ki na? Nimnni tarik 31/03/2024 asa, na zalear tujea ITR-ak problem zatle, ani GSTIN cancelui zaunk xakta!
